comment.author: 37996646559@N01
comment._content: Higgins made the flat-bottom boats used by the Americans for the Normandy invasion.  The D-Day Museum in NOLA has a big exhibit about them.

comment.author: 12232898@N03
comment._content: This appears to be one of the Higgins buildings on the Industrial Canal.  The last of these buildings were torn down in the 60's.
